title: Soma Cafe Ubud
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was all-veg when it first opened in 2010 but has since added fish to its menu (Nov 2014). Organic cafe and retail space frequented by westerners and tourists. Hosts live music sometimes. Has raw chocolate and extensive drinks menu.
